content: this timeless baby bonnet is worked flat from the bottom up and finished with an i-cord edge for a neat and practical tie the bonnet is shaped with gentle decreases to fit snugly around the head and the seamless construction makes it soft and comfortable for babies aged 1 to 3 months knit in a breathable merino-cotton blend this bonnet is lightweight stretchy and gentle on sensitive skin perfect for everyday wear techniques used bottom-up knitting in flat back-and-forth row simple shaping with decreases i-cord edging and ties no seaming size 1 3 months materials merino-cotton blend yarn dk/light worsted 3 5 mm needles or size to meet gauge stitch markers yarn needle scissors want the written pattern you can find the full written version here https //maylilyknitting com/lines-baby-bonnet-knitting-pattern-1-3-months-beginner-friendly/
